text: The Devils is a 1971 British American thriller movie directed by Ken Russell and stars Vanessa Redgrave, Oliver Reed, Brian Murphy, Dudley Sutton, Max Adrian, Georgina Hale, Kenneth Colley. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Ken Russell
title: The Devils (movie)
